casenumber: CA 116/2002/D, Adm in Personam 32/2000, Adm in Rem 21/2000
casename: Feoso (Singapore) Pte Ltd v Faith Maritime Company Limited
coram: Belinda Ang Saw Ean J; Chao Hick Tin JA; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Haridass Ajaib, Thomas Tan (Haridass Ho & Partners) for the Appellants; Richard Kuek,R Govintharasah (Gurbani & Co) for the Respondents

headings.text: (i) No incorporation of Clause 8 of the head charter as a bill of lading term – a new point
(ii) Could a contractual lien for demurrage be enforced against Feoso?
(iii) Was discharge port demurrage earned by Faith?
